data.meta_description:
Vuyolwethu Zungula is a South African politician who is the president of the African Transformation Movement. 

He and Thandiswa Marawu have been representingâ€¦
data.text:
Delivering a keynote to wellness professionals in East London was such a huge honour and privilege. I explored how they can unlock their leadership potential through the right habits and rituals. Thank you to the EAPA SA Ikhala Chapter for the invite and great hospitality.

We have just concluded an impactful workshop with SMMEs from Aliwal North, in collaboration with Absa Group South Africa and the Joe Gqabi Economic Development Agency . ğŸš€ Over 50 passionate SMMEs, specializing in construction, livestock farming, manufacturing, and catering, attended the event. ğŸ› ï¸ğŸ„ğŸ­ğŸ½ï¸ It was inspiring to see the enthusiasm and commitment of these entrepreneurs as they work towards growing their businesses. ğŸŒ± We look forward to more such productive sessions! Next stop .. ğŸ“STERKSPRUIT

Global Leadership Consultants Pty Ltd has partnered with Joe Gqabi Economic Development Agency and Absa South Africa to provide a series of workshops across the Joe Gqabi district. SMMEs in the various areas are welcome to RSVP to attend the sessions. **Workshop Topics:** - Business Funding - Sales Strategy - Cash Flow Management We still have space in **Burgersdorp** and **Barkley East** for a few SMMEs. All other areas are fully booked. **Eligibility:** - Must be a registered Level 1 or 2 compliant SMME residing in the area. To book your seat, click on the link below: [RSVP Here](https://lnkd.in/eHQe2Uua) Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your business skills and network with other entrepreneurs

On the 11th and 12th we will be at the Mendi Arts Centre for the Absa South Africa SMME Empowerment workshop run by Global Leadership Consultants . We still have 5 more seats available. We will also be providing free bookkeeping services sponsored by Siphosethu Smetu and his team for the SMMEâ€™S that we will be coaching for 6 months . RSVP details are on the poster ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡

I'm hitting the road to visit some incredible Small, Medium, and Micro Enterprises (SMMEs) around the Eastern Cape over the next few months. I recently met a fantastic fruit seller whoâ€™s making a whopping R20k + monthly just by selling fruit! ğŸğŸŠğŸ‡ Check out his amazing story and see how he does it. ğŸ”— **Watch the video here:** [How To Make R10K-R20K a month Selling Fruit](https://lnkd.in/dsVNzkrt)

If you want to know more about the latest interventions that ECDC - Eastern Cape Development Corporation has launched in the past few months/ years , watch this video . It will help you get a better understanding of .. âœ”ï¸The STREP Fund âœ”ï¸ The Job Stimulus Fund âœ”ï¸ The Imvaba Co Operative Fund And other financial and non financial services ECDC offers . ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ ABSA SMME Workshop 2024 | ECDC Presentation | Ncedisa Goniwe https://lnkd.in/digrkaA6

Our podcast with Lincoln Mali is now streaming on all major podcast platforms! With over 25 years of leadership in Banking and Fintech, Lincoln Mali brings invaluable insights into Leadership, People Management, Strategy, Culture, Customer Experience, and Business Performance. Join us as we delve into engaging conversations about leadership, ethics, transformation, and social change. ğŸ§âœ¨

We are thrilled to share the success of our recent SMME workshop held last week at Chatty Community Hall. In partnership with the Bloemendal Business Development Agency, we delivered an impactful session tailored for SMMEs, providing valuable insights and strategies for growth. A special thanks to our partners at ABSA Bank, who joined us to discuss their offerings and support for SMMEs. Together, we are empowering local businesses to thrive and succeed. #SMME #BusinessDevelopment #Partnerships #ABSA #CommunityGrowth

I had a great conversation with Hilton ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¦ Theunissen ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¦ and Darryl Dennis yesterday on entrepreneurship and the state of South Africa. Hilton is a venture builder focused on inclusive economic. Heâ€™s the founder of Zuza Ventures and Co-founder of GrowthWheel International Inc. Darryl is the CEO of the Mandela Bay IHub, a leading tech and business incubator in NMB supporting innovation-driven SMMEs in the ICT sector. Link to Podcast : https://lnkd.in/dAhcuWwY

A few months ago we spoke with Tjaart van der Walt who is the co-founder and director of TymeBank on the major financial milestone that the bank reached in achieving profitability in less then 5 years. Tjaart spoke to us about what is next for the Tymebank and how the bank managed to achieve this amazing milestone. Listen to the podcast on all podcast streaming platforms . https://lnkd.in/dQPSxTTe
